synopsis.text: Story revolves around Morisaki Yuuta, a high school student and photography club member, whose life takes an unexpected turn after a chance encounter in the school corridor. As he navigates his new life in the city with his older sister Ruri, he finds himself surrounded by a bevy of women, both old friends and new acquaintances. Among them is Hina Kusunose, a charming yet clumsy tennis club member who shares a forgotten childhood promise with Yuuta. As Yuuta struggles to manage his relationships with these women, he must also confront his growing feelings for Hina, all while trying to decipher who truly holds the key to his heart. This anime is an adaptation of the popular dating simulation game, True Love Story series. With its engaging characters and intricate relationships, this anime promises to take viewers on a rollercoaster ride of emotions as they follow Yuuta's journey towards finding true love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
